about_the_game:
You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.

  • Stay alert to anomalies.
  • When you encounter an anomaly, go back.
  • If you do not find anomalies, move forward.
  • Every lit candle is a step towards your destiny.


In Everloop, you find yourself trapped in an endless hallway, where every step and glance are crucial to unraveling the path to your destiny. A journey of observation, reflection, and discovery. Where reality intertwines with the surreal, your perception is your greatest ally.

Key Features:


  • Detailed Exploration: Navigate through a mysterious corridor, filled with details and secrets waiting to be discovered. Each element of the environment could be the key to moving forward or a sign to retreat.
  • Mysterious Anomalies: Stay alert to any changes in your surroundings. Anomalies are both a challenge and a guide, bringing you closer to freedom or casting you back to the start.
  • Important Decisions: Choose wisely when to advance or retreat. Each decision impacts your path and will reveal new secrets.
  • Anomaly Codex: Discover and delve into the lore of Everloop with the Anomaly Codex, a detailed compilation of all the anomalies you will encounter, offering insights and stories that enrich the game experience and deepen the mystery of the infinite hallway.

  • Visible Progress: With every candle lit, you are one step closer to solving the mystery of the corridor and reaching your destiny. Each flame is a milestone in your journey.
  • Play Time: 15-60 minutes

name: Everloop

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You are trapped in an endless hallway. Observe your surroundings carefully to reach your destiny.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Portuguese - Brazil
